power-strike.name: Power Strike

special: Target is pushed back 10 ft.

power-strike.description: Channel raw physical force into a devastating blow. Your muscles surge with supernatural strength as you drive forward. 3D8 + MIT Modifier physical damage. Target is pushed back 10 ft.

iron-grip.name: Iron Grip

special: Grapple target - they cannot move
Opposed MIT check each turn to escape
While grappled, can use Crush (1 AP) for 2D6 damage

iron-grip.description: Your hands become unyielding vices, capable of crushing steel and holding fast against any force that tries to break free.

brace-for-impact.name: Brace for Impact

special: If successfully defend, attacker takes 1D6 damage from recoil

brace-for-impact.description: Plant your feet and prepare your body to absorb incoming force. You become an immovable object against the world's assault.

crushing-blow.name: Crushing Blow

special: Ignores 2 points of damage reduction

crushing-blow.description: Bring down your fist, elbow, or weapon with the weight of mountains. Armor crumples; bones shatter.

titans-presence.name: Titan's Presence

special: All enemies must make COR check (Difficulty 30) or suffer -1 D20 on attack rolls against you

titans-presence.description: Your physical power radiates outward, an aura of raw might that makes lesser beings hesitate.

rampage.name: Rampage

special: Make 3 separate attacks
Each successful hit adds +1D8 to subsequent attacks this turn
After use, defensive rolls suffer -1 D20 for 1 round

rampage.description: Unleash a flurry of devastating strikes, each blow building momentum into the next. You become an engine of destruction.

colossal-guard.name: Colossal Guard

special: Choose up to 2 allies within 10 ft.
Any attacks targeting them can be redirected to you

colossal-guard.description: Your body becomes a living shield for those you protect. Attacks meant for allies strike you instead.

worldbreaker.name: Worldbreaker

special: 15 ft. radius shockwave deals 2D10 to all other enemies and knocks them back 10 ft.
Once per combat

worldbreaker.description: Channel every fiber of your being into a single, cataclysmic strike. The ground cracks, the air shudders.

swift-strike.name: Swift Strike

special: After attacking, suffer -1 D20 on defensive rolls until your next turn

swift-strike.description: Move like lightning, striking before your opponent can react. Your blade or fist finds its mark before they register the threat.

evasive-step.name: Evasive Step

special: If successful, may move 10 ft. without provoking opportunity attacks

evasive-step.description: Your body flows around attacks like water around stone. You're simply not where the strike lands.

burst-of-speed.name: Burst of Speed

special: At turn's end, lose 5 ST from exertion

burst-of-speed.description: Push your muscles beyond their limits for a moment of impossible swiftness. Your movement speed doubles this turn.

blinding-flurry.name: Blinding Flurry

special: Make 2 attacks using single attack roll
If both hit, target gains Shocked
You gain Exposed for 1 round after

blinding-flurry.description: Your strikes come so fast they appear as a single blur of motion. Opponents barely see the first before the fifth has landed.

afterimage.name: Afterimage

special: Create 2 illusory duplicates
Attacks against you have 50% chance to target a duplicate instead
When struck, duplicate vanishes

afterimage.description: Move so quickly that residual images of yourself linger where you were. Enemies strike at phantoms.

thousand-cuts.name: Thousand Cuts

special: Attack all enemies within 10 ft.
For each enemy hit, take 3 damage from overexertion
You are Exposed until your next turn

thousand-cuts.description: Become a whirlwind of blade and motion, striking every enemy within reach before they can mount any defense.

perfect-counter.name: Perfect Counter

special: Immediately make a counterattack when successfully defending
If counterattack fails, take the original attack's damage

perfect-counter.description: Time slows as you read your opponent's attack. You don't just dodge - you make them pay for the attempt.

time-slip.name: Time Slip

special: Teleport up to 60 ft.
Make 4 attacks against any targets in path
After use, cannot use Speed abilities for 2 rounds and gain Exposed
Once per combat

time-slip.description: For a single, impossible moment, you move between the spaces of time itself. You cease to exist and reappear elsewhere, having wreaked havoc in the interim.

steel-resolve.name: Steel Resolve

special: Reduce all damage taken by 3
Cannot be knocked prone during this time

steel-resolve.description: Harden your body and mind against incoming harm. Pain becomes a distant sensation, damage a minor inconvenience.

second-wind.name: Second Wind

special: Restore 2D10 ST
Remove one stack of Exhaustion if present

second-wind.description: Reach deep within yourself and find reserves of energy you didn't know existed. Your body remembers what it means to be whole.

enduring-stance.name: Enduring Stance

grants: Cannot be pushed, pulled, or moved against your will

enduring-stance.description: Plant yourself like an ancient oak. Your roots run deep, and nothing shall move you from where you stand.

pain-is-fuel.name: Pain is Fuel

special: For each 10 HP of damage taken, gain +1 to damage rolls
Maximum +5 bonus
Lasts until healed above 75% HP

pain-is-fuel.description: Transform suffering into strength. Each wound you endure feeds your determination, making you more dangerous.

stone-body.name: Stone Body

special: Movement reduced by 10 ft.

stone-body.description: Your flesh becomes as unyielding as granite. Blades glance off, blows lose their force, and you endure what would fell lesser warriors.

unbreakable.name: Unbreakable

special: If damage would reduce you to 0 HP, remain at 1 HP instead
Can trigger once per round
After duration ends, take 20 damage that cannot be reduced

unbreakable.description: You refuse to fall. Through sheer force of will, you remain standing when your body has every reason to collapse.

guardians-aegis.name: Guardian's Aegis

special: Allies within range can redirect damage to you
You gain damage reduction 5

guardians-aegis.description: Your endurance becomes a shield for others. You absorb the punishment meant for your allies.

immortal-bastion.name: Immortal Bastion

grants: Immunity to Stunned, Frozen, and knockback
special: Regenerate 2D8 HP at start of each turn
Once per combat

immortal-bastion.description: You become an unstoppable bulwark, a living fortress that refuses to yield.

heightened-awareness.name: Heightened Awareness
heightened-awareness.description: Open your senses beyond their normal limits. Every sound becomes distinct, every shadow reveals its secrets.

detect-weakness.name: Detect Weakness

special: Next attack deals +2D6 damage
Must be used within 3 rounds

detect-weakness.description: Study your target's movements and identify the gaps in their defenses. Their vulnerabilities become clear as day.

share-senses.name: Share Senses
share-senses.description: Link your enhanced perception to an ally, allowing them to perceive the world through your trained eyes.

blind-fighting.name: Blind Fighting

grants: No penalties fighting in darkness or against invisible enemies

blind-fighting.description: Your other senses compensate when sight fails. Sound, smell, vibration - everything tells you where your enemies are.

expose-opening.name: Expose Opening
expose-opening.description: With a sharp call or gesture, reveal an enemy's vulnerability to your allies. Your keen sight becomes their advantage.

predators-mark.name: Predator's Mark

grants: Always know target's direction and distance

predators-mark.description: Your senses lock onto a target like a hunting beast. No matter where they go, you will find them.

vital-strike.name: Vital Strike

special: If attack misses, you are Exposed

vital-strike.description: Your enhanced perception reveals exactly where to strike. One precise blow to a vital point can end a fight instantly.

omniscient-eye.name: Omniscient Eye

grants: Cannot be hit by attacks while you have movement available
special: All attacks deal +3D12 damage
Once per combat

omniscient-eye.description: Your senses transcend mortal limits. You perceive the battlefield as a single, unified whole - every heartbeat, every intention.

flowing-strike.name: Flowing Strike

special: If defensive roll this turn was successful, add +1D10 damage

flowing-strike.description: Adopt the fluid movements of water-based martial forms. Your strikes redirect force rather than opposing it directly. Style: Jiu-Jitsu/Aikido.

rising-dragon.name: Rising Dragon

special: Target is launched 5 ft. upward

rising-dragon.description: Channel explosive power through your legs, launching upward with a devastating knee or uppercut. Style: Muay Thai.

iron-palm.name: Iron Palm

special: Can be used to break objects/barriers (+10 to MIT check)

iron-palm.description: Condition your hands to become weapons of hardened flesh and bone. A single palm strike can shatter stone. Style: Kung Fu.

serpents-coil.name: Serpent's Coil

special: Target takes 2D6 damage at start of each turn

serpents-coil.description: Wrap around your opponent like a constrictor, controlling their movement and slowly crushing their resistance. Style: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu.

hurricane-kick.name: Hurricane Kick

special: Hit all enemies within 5 ft.
May move 10 ft. after attack without provoking attacks

hurricane-kick.description: Spin with tremendous force, delivering multiple kicks in a single whirling motion. Style: Taekwondo/Capoeira.

dim-mak.name: Dim Mak

special: Target must make GRT check (Difficulty 40) or one limb becomes unusable for 3 rounds

dim-mak.description: Strike precisely at pressure points and nerve clusters. Your fingers find the paths that disrupt the body's vital energy. Style: Traditional Chinese Martial Arts.

stance-of-the-mountain.name: Stance of the Mountain

special: Cannot move
When successfully defending, automatically counterattack for 5D6 + GRT damage

stance-of-the-mountain.description: Root yourself in an immovable defensive posture. Those who strike you find their attacks turned against them. Style: Shaolin.

hundred-fist-barrage.name: Hundred-Fist Barrage

special: Make 5 attacks
Each hit adds +1 D20 to subsequent attacks
If 3+ attacks hit, target is Stunned for 1 round

hundred-fist-barrage.description: Transcend the limits of human speed and strength. Your fists become a storm of precision strikes. Style: Boxing/Multiple.

weapon-mastery.name: Weapon Mastery
weapon-mastery.description: Your training allows you to wield any weapon with supernatural skill. Pick up a stranger's blade and use it like you've trained with it for years. When using a weapon for the first time in combat, gain +2 D20 on your first attack with it.

weapon-bond.name: Weapon Bond

grants: Cannot be disarmed of this weapon

weapon-bond.description: Choose one weapon you're holding. Gain +1 D20 on attack rolls with it. Cannot be disarmed of this weapon. Can recall weapon within 50 ft. Duration: 1 hour.

precise-cut.name: Precise Cut

special: Ignores 2 points of damage reduction

precise-cut.description: A clean, surgical strike that exploits gaps in armor and defenses. Efficiency over power.

power-thrust.name: Power Thrust

special: If target is against a wall or obstacle, add +2D6 damage

power-thrust.description: Drive your weapon forward with your full body weight behind it. A simple technique, devastating in execution.

sweeping-arc.name: Sweeping Arc

special: Hit all enemies in 10 ft. arc
Enemies hit must make SPD check (Difficulty 30) or be pushed back 5 ft.

sweeping-arc.description: A wide, powerful swing that catches multiple enemies in its path.

disarming-strike.name: Disarming Strike

special: On hit, target must make opposed MIT check or be disarmed
Disarmed weapon lands 15 ft. away

disarming-strike.description: Target your opponent's grip rather than their body. A twist of your blade sends their weapon flying.

executioners-stance.name: Executioner's Stance

special: All attacks deal +3D8 damage
Critical hits deal triple damage instead of double

executioners-stance.description: Enter a deadly stance where every strike aims to kill. Your attacks become more lethal but leave you vulnerable.

supreme-weapon-master.name: Supreme Weapon Master

special: Attacks deal +4D6 damage
May attack twice per attack action
Thrown weapons return to hand
Choose: Blade Dance (melee hits all adjacent) or Dead Eye (ranged ignores cover, +20 ft. range)
Once per combat

supreme-weapon-master.description: You have transcended ordinary combat. Every weapon, every stance, every technique is yours to command.
